title: A Wizard Is Never Late (1R87)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Play a [Gandalf] character from your draw deck.
Lore:	”'A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins, nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.'”
Rarity:	R
